reviews.review_msg: Professor Matsumura is great! I agree, you gotta work hard to earn a good grade but what do you expect, its a 300 level course. fair marker, very nice lady, and definitely knows her stuff. great class and would def. take again. Also she got us pizza on the last day of class!!! also shes pretty hilarious too

lots of reading, notes, and tutorial participation but extreamly good prof..just keep in mind there is no midterm and the final is easy so don't do all the reading taking pages of notes is a waste and tutorial readings are theoretical not fact bases so just use your noodle...great prof !
